It wouldn't take an entire sound crew to sneak an mp3 recorder into a theater and put it on their lap to supplement the audio tracks.  if I wasn't such a broke ass cheapskate, I'd spring for the $30 for the device and $8 for the movie ticket to provide a good audio source.  Is there anyone else that does not fit my description?
